issue.title: Can't use Quarkiverse Qute extension with Gradle component variant based configuration resolution
issue.body:
### Describe the bug

[Qute templating engine](https://quarkus.io/guides/qute) guide mentions the Quarkiverse extension (`io.quarkiverse.qute.web:quarkus-qute-web`), and not the one located in this repo (`io.quarkus:quarkus-qute`).

However, the former doesn't properly work with the new configuration resolution method using component variants introduced in 01d1bcf7. Building the app fails with
```
> Could not resolve all dependencies for configuration ':quarkusProdRuntimeClasspathConfigurationDeployment'.
   > io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-reactive-qute:3.15.1 did not resolve to any artifacts
```

### Expected behavior

App works

### Actual behavior

```
$ ./gradlew :quarkusGenerateAppModel --info -s
Initialized native services in: /Users/teymur/.gradle/native
Initialized jansi services in: /Users/teymur/.gradle/native
The client will now receive all logging from the daemon (pid: 48992). The daemon log file: /Users/teymur/.gradle/daemon/8.14.3/daemon-48992.out.log
Starting 3rd build in daemon [uptime: 7 mins 32.631 secs, performance: 99%, GC rate: 0.00/s, heap usage: 4% of 512 MiB, non-heap usage: 19% of 384 MiB]
Using 12 worker leases.
Now considering [/Volumes/cs-code-vol/reproducers/qute-quarkiverse-issue] as hierarchies to watch
Watching the file system is configured to be enabled if available
File system watching is active
Starting Build
Settings evaluated using settings file '/Volumes/cs-code-vol/reproducers/qute-quarkiverse-issue/settings.gradle'.
Projects loaded. Root project using build file '/Volumes/cs-code-vol/reproducers/qute-quarkiverse-issue/build.gradle'.
Included projects: [root project 'qute-quarkiverse-issue']

> Configure project :
Evaluating root project 'qute-quarkiverse-issue' using build file '/Volumes/cs-code-vol/reproducers/qute-quarkiverse-issue/build.gradle'.
Resolved plugin [id: 'java']
Resolved plugin [id: 'io.quarkus', version: '3.25.4']
All projects evaluated.
Task path ':quarkusGenerateAppModel' matched project ':'
Task name matched 'quarkusGenerateAppModel'
Selected primary task 'quarkusGenerateAppModel' from project :

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Could not determine the dependencies of task ':quarkusGenerateAppModel'.
> Could not resolve all dependencies for configuration ':quarkusProdRuntimeClasspathConfigurationDeployment'.
   > io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-reactive-qute:3.15.1 did not resolve to any artifacts

* Try:
> Run with --debug option to get more log output.
> Run with --scan to get full insights.
> Get more help at https://help.gradle.org.

* Exception is:

```

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/reaver585/qute-quarkiverse-issue

To reproduce, run `./gradlew :quarkusGenerateAppModel --info -s`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

body: This is actually not specific to `QuarkusComponentVariants`. To be accurate, it the target artifact of the conditional dependency that needs to be aligned with the version constraints enforced in a project.
